data

Class Spreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • data.Spreadsheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Environment, SubmitListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class Spreadsheet
extends java.util.Observable
implements Environment, SubmitListener
    The data structure of for the XL program. It stores the spreadsheet data as an address-content mapping using a Hashmap. It is also an observable that will update all of its observers when there is a state change. It listens to components in the GUI for SubmitEvents and fires ExceptionEvents when exceptions are thrown internally.

    • Method Detail

      • integrityCheckPassed

        private boolean integrityCheckPassed()
        Try to calculate the value for every filled slot in the spreadsheet.
        Returns:
        true if the all values can be calculated without throwing an exception.

      • content

        public java.lang.String content(java.lang.String name)
        Get the string value of a given slot. Both Expressions and Comments will be returned.
        Parameters:
        name - of the desired slot
        Returns:
        the String that the slot object contains.
